DOC.HEADLINE: IRAN ' S GRAND AYATOLLAH , 100 , IS ' TERMINALLY ILL '
DOC.TEXT: Iran ' s 100-year-old senior religious_leader is terminally ill , the Islamic Republic News_Agency reported Monday . A doctor treating Grand Ayatollah Mohammed Ali Araki said his condition " has deteriorated over the past few days. " Iranian authorities designated Araki the top spiritual guide of the world ' s estimated 200 million Shiite Muslims last year .
